name: hantibink
description: A modern dating app connecting the Armenian community worldwide

scripts.lint: cd mobile && npm run lint && cd ../api && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd mobile && npm run lint:fix && cd ../api && npm run lint:fix
scripts.format: cd mobile && npm run format && cd ../api && npm run format
scripts.deps:check: cd mobile && npm run deps:check && cd ../api && npm run deps:check
scripts.deps:update: cd mobile && npm run deps:update && cd ../api && npm run deps:update
scripts.security:audit: cd mobile && npm run security:audit && cd ../api && npm run security:audit
scripts.security:fix: cd mobile && npm run security:fix && cd ../api && npm run security:fix
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd mobile && npm install && cd ../api && npm install
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules mobile/node_modules api/node_modules && npm run install:all
scripts.dev:tunnel: concurrently "cd mobile && npm run start:tunnel" "npm run api"
